title: Soldier by Harlan Ellison - BBC Radio - SeymourDAC
description:
SOLDIER by Harlan Ellison.

Read by John Sharian.

In a devastated future, Qarlo the footsoldier battles the enemy in a twilight landscape. Suddenly, beams of light send him back in time to 1964.

This short story was the inspiration for The Terminator and was filmed as an episode of The Outer Limits.

Two half-hour episodes.

My recordings from BBC7 at 64kbps ABR single-channel mono mp3.

Have fun and please seed,

SeymourDAC
